name: BlueScreenView
description: A small utility that displays details of BSOD errors (blue screen of death, or stop errors). BlueScreenView can read Windows minidump logs of other machines on your network. See the 'Site' link for other versions and documentation.

name: Notion
description: All-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, wikis, and databases. Perfect for personal productivity and team collaboration.

name: Figma
description: Collaborative interface design tool with real-time collaboration, prototyping, and design systems.

name: PowerShell
description: Cross-platform task automation and scripting language built on .NET, perfect for system administration.

name: Slack
description: Team communication platform with channels, direct messages, file sharing, and extensive integrations.

name: GitHub Desktop
description: Simple GUI for Git version control with GitHub integration, making it easy to manage repositories visually.

name: Canva
description: User-friendly graphic design platform with templates for presentations, social media, posters, and more.

name: Zoom
description: Video conferencing platform for meetings, webinars, and online collaboration with screen sharing and recording.

name: Trello
description: Kanban-style project management tool with boards, lists, and cards for organizing tasks and workflows.

name: Adobe Photoshop
description: Professional image editing and graphic design software with advanced photo manipulation capabilities.
